===Noun===
{{zh-noun|mw=個}}

# [[aspect]]; [[side]]; (on the one) [[hand]]; [[facet]]; [[respect]]
# {{lb|zh|archaic|literary}} [[direction]]
# {{lb|zh|archaic|literary}} [[official]] [[post]]; [[duty]]

====Usage notes====
* It is acceptable to use {{zh-l|方面}} both with or without a classifier; both {{zh-l|[[三]][[方面]]|tr=sān fāngmiàn}} and {{l|zh|[[三]][[個]][[方面]]／[[三]][[个]][[方面]]|tr=sān gè fāngmiàn}} are commonly used.
* When using the term with {{zh-l|這}} or {{zh-l|那}}, both {{zh-l|[[這]]（[[那]]）[[一]][[方面]]／[[这]]（[[那]]）[[一]][[方面]]|tr=zhè (nà) yī fāngmiàn}} and {{zh-l|[[這]]（[[那]]）[[個]][[方面]]／[[这]]（[[那]]）[[个]][[方面]]|tr=zhè (nà) gè fāngmiàn}} are acceptable constructions, the former being more formal than the latter.
* Unlike in Japanese, {{zh-l|方面}} in modern Chinese never conveys the meaning of ''direction''; {{zh-l|方向}} is used instead.
